mapper.insert: insert into city.award(name, type, grade, cont_id, org_id, user_id, team_id) values (#{name}, #{type}, #{grade}, #{cont_id}, #{org_id}, #{user_id}, #{team_id})
mapper.update: update city.award set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, grade = #{grade}, cont_id = #{cont_id}, org_id = #{org_id}, user_id = #{user_id}, team_id = #{team_id} where id = #{id}
